categories: Category:The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook recipes

nodes.text: Nectrose Freeze was a type of ice cream created by the chef Strono Tuggs. The white dish could be served with a Golden Lichen Tuile and nectrose crystals as topping. Nectrose Freeze was consumable by Artiodacs, and was once sold to a Vandor research team. After the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY, Tuggs began to serve it in his traveling restaurant, Tuggs' Grub, while stationed in Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo on the Outer Rim planet Batuu.
Nectrose Freeze was first mentioned in the 2019 recipe book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, which was authored by Chelsea Monroe-Cassel and Marc Sumerak.
